dcterms:creator: X. Chen
R. Mottaghi
X. Liu
S. Fidler
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The public PASCAL-Person-part dataset concentrates on the human part segmentation annotated by Chen et al. from PASCAL VOC 2010 dataset. The dataset contains detailed part annotations for every person, resulting in six person part classes and one background class.
dcterms:title: PASCAL-Person-Part dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Wang
A. Yuille
dcterms:description: The Horse-Cow parsing dataset is a part segmentation benchmark introduced by Wang and Yuille. It includes images where each pixel is labeled as one of the four part classes: head, leg, tail, and body.
dcterms:title: Horse-Cow parsing dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Liang
S. Liu
X. Shen
J. Yang
L. Liu
J. Dong
L. Lin
S. Yan
dcterms:description: The ATR dataset is designed for human parsing, predicting every pixel of each image with 18 labels including face, hair, upper-clothes, and more. It originally includes 7,700 images with a split for training, testing, and validation.
dcterms:title: ATR dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Yamaguchi
M. Kiapour
L. Ortiz
T. Berg
dcterms:description: The Fashionista dataset contains images of clothing items parsed into various categories. It includes 685 images, with a split for training and testing.
dcterms:title: Fashionista dataset
